title: Build and Deploy Python Web Application
description: Complete workflow: build Python Flask app image, run with port mapping and volumes, verify deployment

steps.instruction: Build Docker image from Flask application Dockerfile
steps.expected_outcome: Image flask-app:v1.0 built successfully with size ~150MB

steps.instruction: Run Flask container with port 5000 mapped to host 8080 and mount logs directory
steps.expected_outcome: Container flask-web running on port 8080 with logs mounted

steps.instruction: Inspect container logs to verify Flask application started correctly
steps.expected_outcome: Logs show Flask server running on 0.0.0.0:5000

steps.instruction: Execute health check command inside running container

success_criteria: Flask application accessible on host:8080, health check passing, logs visible
cleanup: docker stop flask-web && docker rm flask-web
